body.name: appacare 2 PCS Bed Frame Brackets Modi-Plate Bed Frame Adapter/Connector, Heavy Duty Bed Frame Modification to Connect Headboard Footboard
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 7 mins
features: Suitable for bed frames, bed rails, headboards, footboards, bed posts, bunk bed ladders, new wood frames, existing wood frames and other wooden furniture.Applicable when the lateral distance between the bed frame and headboard is less than 6.3 inches.
Set includes two modification plates; to attach both a headboard and a footboard you'll need two sets
Headboard Attachment Brackets made of high quality steel, electrophoresis black plated to prevent rust and corrosion, ensure a long life and prevent damage to your bed.
Headboard bracket offset mounting design allows a wide range of headboard widths to fit your frame. Multiple slots allow for adjustable sizing.
Non-mortise, just use screwdriver to mount and disassemble the bed rail fittings, quickly and easily
Before purchasing, please pay attention to measuring whether the holes size of the bed frame and headboard matches to the item
If there is any problem with the product, we support unconditional return or exchange. Please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Application: The bed frame brackets adapter perfect for full (double) to queen conversions. This modification plate can also be used to convert king headboards to California King frames. Materials : Headboard Attachment Brackets made of high quality steel. Electrophoresis black plated to prevent rust and corrosion. Heavy duty, a long life and prevent damage to your bed. Dimension:Thickness: 2mm; 4-1/4" Width; Larger Side: 6-5/8" Height; Smaller Side: 5-1/16" Height. Function:Headboard bracket offset mounting design allows a wide range of headboard widths to fit your frame. Can be used universal horizontal and vertical. Multiple slots allow for adjustable sizing. Including: 2PCS bed modification plates, 4 long screws, 4 short screws, 8 washers, 8 nuts Inatallation: Just install bolts and screws directly, disassembly also easily, no need others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well enough so far
reviews.reviewText: This doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure out but yet I had one bracket on the opposite way from the other! There isn't anything advising a "preferred" method of install or anything, the vertical attachment side has one longer segment, one shorter segment. It messes you up if they aren't in the same direction. Once I got that straight it attached well enough to my headboard (that I'm still annoyed didn't come with these brackets but that's not the bracket company's fault). Headboard went on, I wish it could be nudged up higher but it's already a bit wobbly. It's going against a wall so no big deal anyway. I'm happy overall, I don't anticipate issues. The screws provided worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick solution to attach King sized headboard to a California King bed frame
reviews.reviewText: this was fairly easy to install. Need to measure both sides to make sure frame is entered with the bed frame. This bracket did exactly what I envisioned it to do when I started my search online to find a solution to attach the King size headboard to a California King size bed frame.Note I JUST installed it last night so I don't know yet how this will hold up. But I don't expect there to be a problem cause this is pretty straightforward (as long as you have the bed up against the wall and not freestanding in the middle of a room!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Plate is Necessary!!
reviews.reviewText: Additional screws are pointless you’ll have to go to the hardware store and get what your headboard and bed frame requires. - the ones included definitely are if no help!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: does what it should. bolts were a little pain but other than that it's good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these to help attach a headboard to a bed frame. They appear to be very sturdy and strong. Very easy to align and fit to the bed frame. I believe these will hold for a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked like a charm
reviews.reviewText: The Bed Frame bracket mounts a couple different ways almost guaranteeing a good fit. It took a little time to figure it out but then it worked wonderfully. The frame is sturdy and came with solid hardware. Definitely would recommend this product.
